title: David Pecker Agrees to Catch and Kill Negative Trump Stories at Trump Tower Meeting
summary: National Enquirer publisher David Pecker meets with Trump, Cohen, and Hope Hicks at Trump Tower, agrees to use tabloid to catch and kill sexual affair allegations against Trump during campaign

sources.title: David Pecker Trump deal catch and kill
David Pecker Testifies on Trump Hush Money Catch-And-Kill Scheme
Trump trial hears testimony from David Pecker about "catch and kill" scheme
Hidden world of 'catch-and-kill' tabloids spotlighted in Trump's hush money trial
Inside the 3 so-called 'catch and kill' payments in Trump's indictment

notes: Foundation of catch-and-kill operation. Led to McDougal, Sajudin, Daniels payments. Criminal prosecution resulted. Pecker got immunity for testimony.
